3.result:
Based on my analysis of the sitemap and the content from the private equity page, here are the URLs most likely to contain information about portfolio companies:

1. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/private-equity - This page contains detailed information about their portfolio companies, investment criteria, and approach.

2. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/2021-11-CS-ADC-TOPS-2.pdf - This is a case study about one of their portfolio companies (TOPS Software).

3. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/american-pain-consortium-holdings-announces-strategic-growth-investment-from-american-discovery-capital - News about investment in a portfolio company.

4. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/american-discovery-capital-announces-investment-in-medix-staffing-solutions-llc - News about investment in Medix.

5. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/tops-software-announces-strategic-growth-investment-from-american-discovery-capital - News about investment in TOPS Software.

6. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/american-discovery-capital-announces-strategic-growth-investment-in-smartbug-media - News about investment in SmartBug Media.

7. https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news - This page likely contains additional news about their investments and portfolio companies.

content.text:
Based on the sitemap provided, I'll analyze which URLs are most likely to contain information about portfolio companies by looking for keywords like 'portfolio', 'investments', 'companies', and 'holdings'.

Let me examine the URLs:

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Private Equity

# A true partnership approach that aligns with your success.

As founders ourselves, we are attuned to the unique needs, challenges and exciting possibilities facing founder-led, growth-oriented businesses. We feel this shared experience as business owners makes us better stewards of capital and more constructive partners to our portfolio companies.

Who We Work With

## Founder-Led &   Family-Owned Businesses

We work with leading founder/family-owned and other closely-held businesses in search of private capital and operational expertise to accelerate organic growth, fund acquisitions, and/or provide liquidity to founders or management owners.

##### Characteristics of These Firms

- Significant equity ownership by founders or management
- Long tenures working together
- Strong sense of pride and identity in their companies
- Aligns with ADC’s ownership culture
- Solid, resilient businesses that reflect the grit and determination of their owners

Our Approach & Network

## Unlocking Value to Optimize Growth

We understand the unique needs of founder-owned and other closely-held businesses and use our deep operational experience, extensive relationship network, and broad M&A and transactional expertise to drive value and successful exit outcomes for our partner firms.

##### How We Do It

- The operational experience of our partners enables us to propel meaningful operational changes that enhance efficiency and growth
- We leverage our extensive network of professional relationships for recruitment of executive/board talent and best practices
- Our deep expertise in M&A and capital markets provides our portfolio companies unique know-how on the acquisition and capital markets levers available to complement value created from operations

Maximizing Future Value

## Wealth creation opportunities for founders and employees.

We believe our M&A, capital markets and operational expertise helps accelerate growth and position companies for outsized equity value creation during our investment horizon.

###### A Second Bite At The Apple

- Attractive additional wealth creation opportunities for founders on “rolled” equity
- Expanded equity pool to incentive management or the next generation of talent

Industry Focus

## Software & Services

We draw on decades of experience as advisors, investors and corporate executives in these industries to provide strategic guidance, the operational know-how, and transactional experience necessary to help our partner firms drive growth and maximize shareholder value.

![tech services icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-tech-services.svg)

Business & Technology Services

![software saas icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-software-saas.svg)

Software/SaaS

![healthcare services icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-healthcare-services.svg)

Healthcare Services

![fintech icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-fintech.svg)

Fintech

## Investment Criteria

- US-based companies with $10-50 million in revenue
- EBITDA profitable or near-term path to profitability
- $10-$50 million target equity investment size
- Control or structured minority equity investments

## Our Investments

Fund IFund II

- American Pain Consortium
- Entertainment Partners
- SmartBug Media
- The Intersect Group
- Majestic Realty
- TOPS Software (Exited)

- Medix
- GreenSlate

Healthcare Services

![APC Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/APC-Logo-color.svg)

#### American Pain Consortium

About the Company

American Pain Consortium (APC) is a growing network of interventional pain management practices and pain-focused ambulatory surgical centers (ASC) that provides state-of-the-art, patient-focused support services to comprehensive pain management practices in the midwest U.S.

Providers at APC focus on managing acute and chronic pain with treatments that include nerve blocks and injections, neuromodulation and implants, physical therapy, psychological counseling, medication management, and compliance monitoring.

[Visit Site](http://www.americanpainconsortium.com/)

Vertical Software and Services

![Entertainment Partners logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/Entertainment-Partners_logo.png?width=200&height=59&name=Entertainment-Partners_logo.png)

#### Entertainment Partners

About the Company

Entertainment Partners (EP) is the industry leader in payroll and residuals services and Production Finance and Production Management technology, delivering integrated, cloud-based digital solutions with military-grade security supporting every phase of production for projects ranging from blockbuster movies to award-winning Indie productions, and from leading television productions to streaming episodic adventures, and more. With offices across the U.S., Canada and the U.K., EP brings together complete background casting and payroll services under one roof with Central Casting, a Hollywood icon since 1925.

[Visit Site](http://www.ep.com/)

Digital Marketing Services

![SmartBug Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png?width=275&height=50&name=SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png)

#### SmartBug Media

About the Company

SmartBug Media® is a globally recognized Intelligent Inbound® marketing agency assisting businesses in growing revenue by generating leads, increasing brand awareness and building customer loyalty through content marketing, sales enablement, revenue operations, web development, marketing automation and public relations.

[Visit Site](https://www.smartbugmedia.com/)

Staffing

![the intersect group logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tig-logo.png?width=221&height=50&name=tig-logo.png)

#### The Intersect Group

About the Company

Founded in 2006, The Intersect Group is a leading staffing company that specializes in placing Information Technology (IT) and Finance & Accounting (F&A) professionals.

[Visit Site](http://www.theintersectgroup.com/)

Real Estate Services

![majestic logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/majestic-realty-1.png?width=160&height=40&name=majestic-realty-1.png)

#### Majestic Realty

About the Company

Majestic Realty ("Majestic") is the highest producing franchisee within the Sotheby’s International Realty (SIR) network, a marquee, luxury residential real estate brokerage brand representing buyers and sellers in many of the most appealing markets in the U.S. and internationally. Majestic consists of the entities LIV SIR, Summit SIR, Sierra SIR, Sun Valley SIR, Las Vegas SIR, and Desert SIR. The Company has grown from a small operator with four offices in Park City, UT to a market leader in the U.S. with 1,000+ agents and 50+ offices across 5 states.

[Visit Site](https://www.livsothebysrealty.com/eng)

Vertical Software

![TOPS Software logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tops-logo-1.png?width=179&height=50&name=tops-logo-1.png)

#### TOPS Software (Exited)

About the Company

TOPS is the leading provider of SaaS accounting, business management, and online resident engagement solutions to community associations and property management companies in the homeowners association (HOA) industry.

TOPS’s software applications are used by thousands of organizations to manage millions of homes across the United States.

[Visit Site](http://www.topssoft.com/)

![Medix Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Untitled%20design%20(2)%20(2).png?width=275&height=57&name=Untitled%20design%20(2)%20(2).png)

#### Medix

About the Company

Medix is one of the largest staffing firms in the U.S., focused on the attractive “Allied Health” vertical within the broader healthcare market. Medix’s healthcare services include a host of non-physician and non-travel nurse “keep the lights on” staff (e.g., registered nurses, medical assistants, technicians, billing/ coding, customer care) that are core to the day-to-day operations of hospitals, medical practices, ambulatory / outpatient providers, labs, insurance companies, and other healthcare providers. Medix also has sizable practices in the areas of information technology (with a focus on healthcare information technology systems and electronic medical records) and life sciences (scientific and clinical research for pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and consumer products / food and beverages).

[Visit Site](https://www.medixteam.com/)

![Greenform Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Greenform%20(1).png?width=275&height=42&name=Greenform%20(1).png)

#### GreenSlate

About the Company

GreenSlate is a leading provider of payroll and production accounting solutions for the entertainment industry. With its comprehensive all-in-one platform, production accountants can more efficiently track production expenses and pay their crews. GreenSlate manages some of the largest episodic budgets in production and supports some of the biggest names in the entertainment industry, including Netflix, Paramount, Imagine Entertainment, Tyler Perry Studios, and many others.

[Visit Site](https://gslate.com/)

## Our Success Stories

### TOPS Software

TOPS is the industry leader in accounting and community management SaaS solutions to the property management and HOA industries, in use at over 45,000 communities nationwide representing more than 5 million homes.

[Read Case Study](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/2021-11-CS-ADC-TOPS-2.pdf?hsLang=en)

![tops logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tops-logo-1.png?width=224&name=tops-logo-1.png)

### SmartBug Media

SmartBug is a globally recognized digital marketing agency assisting businesses in growing revenue by generating leads, increasing brand awareness, and building customer loyalty through content marketing, sales enablement, web development, marketing automation, and public relations.

[Read Case Study](https://fs.hubspotusercontent00.net/hubfs/9480858/2021-11-CS-ADC-SmartBug-1.pdf)

![SmartBug Media logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png?width=275&name=SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png)

conversationHistory.content:
Use firecrawl_scrape to scrape the portfolio pages and extract the names of current, active portfolio companies. All portfolio pages show both current/actively investment companies AND exited companies. You must find the current/actively invested companies. Return ONLY the name of the firm then the list of company names separated by commas, and with zero commentary. Like this: American Discovery Capital: Bubba Gump Shrimp, Nintendo of America, Peeboy Food Cans, etc

Inputs:

content.text: I'll use firecrawl_scrape to extract the names of current, active portfolio companies from the American Discovery Capital website. Let me start with their main private equity page.

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Private Equity

# A true partnership approach that aligns with your success.

As founders ourselves, we are attuned to the unique needs, challenges and exciting possibilities facing founder-led, growth-oriented businesses. We feel this shared experience as business owners makes us better stewards of capital and more constructive partners to our portfolio companies.

Who We Work With

## Founder-Led &   Family-Owned Businesses

We work with leading founder/family-owned and other closely-held businesses in search of private capital and operational expertise to accelerate organic growth, fund acquisitions, and/or provide liquidity to founders or management owners.

##### Characteristics of These Firms

- Significant equity ownership by founders or management
- Long tenures working together
- Strong sense of pride and identity in their companies
- Aligns with ADC’s ownership culture
- Solid, resilient businesses that reflect the grit and determination of their owners

Our Approach & Network

## Unlocking Value to Optimize Growth

We understand the unique needs of founder-owned and other closely-held businesses and use our deep operational experience, extensive relationship network, and broad M&A and transactional expertise to drive value and successful exit outcomes for our partner firms.

##### How We Do It

- The operational experience of our partners enables us to propel meaningful operational changes that enhance efficiency and growth
- We leverage our extensive network of professional relationships for recruitment of executive/board talent and best practices
- Our deep expertise in M&A and capital markets provides our portfolio companies unique know-how on the acquisition and capital markets levers available to complement value created from operations

Maximizing Future Value

## Wealth creation opportunities for founders and employees.

We believe our M&A, capital markets and operational expertise helps accelerate growth and position companies for outsized equity value creation during our investment horizon.

###### A Second Bite At The Apple

- Attractive additional wealth creation opportunities for founders on “rolled” equity
- Expanded equity pool to incentive management or the next generation of talent

Industry Focus

## Software & Services

We draw on decades of experience as advisors, investors and corporate executives in these industries to provide strategic guidance, the operational know-how, and transactional experience necessary to help our partner firms drive growth and maximize shareholder value.

![tech services icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-tech-services.svg)

Business & Technology Services

![software saas icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-software-saas.svg)

Software/SaaS

![healthcare services icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-healthcare-services.svg)

Healthcare Services

![fintech icon](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/icons/icon-fintech.svg)

Fintech

## Investment Criteria

- US-based companies with $10-50 million in revenue
- EBITDA profitable or near-term path to profitability
- $10-$50 million target equity investment size
- Control or structured minority equity investments

## Our Investments

Fund IFund II

- American Pain Consortium
- Entertainment Partners
- SmartBug Media
- The Intersect Group
- Majestic Realty
- TOPS Software (Exited)

- Medix
- GreenSlate

Healthcare Services

![APC Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/APC-Logo-color.svg)

#### American Pain Consortium

About the Company

American Pain Consortium (APC) is a growing network of interventional pain management practices and pain-focused ambulatory surgical centers (ASC) that provides state-of-the-art, patient-focused support services to comprehensive pain management practices in the midwest U.S.

Providers at APC focus on managing acute and chronic pain with treatments that include nerve blocks and injections, neuromodulation and implants, physical therapy, psychological counseling, medication management, and compliance monitoring.

[Visit Site](http://www.americanpainconsortium.com/)

Vertical Software and Services

![Entertainment Partners logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/Entertainment-Partners_logo.png?width=200&height=59&name=Entertainment-Partners_logo.png)

#### Entertainment Partners

About the Company

Entertainment Partners (EP) is the industry leader in payroll and residuals services and Production Finance and Production Management technology, delivering integrated, cloud-based digital solutions with military-grade security supporting every phase of production for projects ranging from blockbuster movies to award-winning Indie productions, and from leading television productions to streaming episodic adventures, and more. With offices across the U.S., Canada and the U.K., EP brings together complete background casting and payroll services under one roof with Central Casting, a Hollywood icon since 1925.

[Visit Site](http://www.ep.com/)

Digital Marketing Services

![SmartBug Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png?width=275&height=50&name=SmartBug_Logo_Final_Black_Large.png)

#### SmartBug Media

About the Company

SmartBug Media® is a globally recognized Intelligent Inbound® marketing agency assisting businesses in growing revenue by generating leads, increasing brand awareness and building customer loyalty through content marketing, sales enablement, revenue operations, web development, marketing automation and public relations.

[Visit Site](https://www.smartbugmedia.com/)

Staffing

![the intersect group logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tig-logo.png?width=221&height=50&name=tig-logo.png)

#### The Intersect Group

About the Company

Founded in 2006, The Intersect Group is a leading staffing company that specializes in placing Information Technology (IT) and Finance & Accounting (F&A) professionals.

[Visit Site](http://www.theintersectgroup.com/)

Real Estate Services

![majestic logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/majestic-realty-1.png?width=160&height=40&name=majestic-realty-1.png)

#### Majestic Realty

About the Company

Majestic Realty ("Majestic") is the highest producing franchisee within the Sotheby’s International Realty (SIR) network, a marquee, luxury residential real estate brokerage brand representing buyers and sellers in many of the most appealing markets in the U.S. and internationally. Majestic consists of the entities LIV SIR, Summit SIR, Sierra SIR, Sun Valley SIR, Las Vegas SIR, and Desert SIR. The Company has grown from a small operator with four offices in Park City, UT to a market leader in the U.S. with 1,000+ agents and 50+ offices across 5 states.

[Visit Site](https://www.livsothebysrealty.com/eng)

Vertical Software

![TOPS Software logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tops-logo-1.png?width=179&height=50&name=tops-logo-1.png)

#### TOPS Software (Exited)

About the Company

TOPS is the leading provider of SaaS accounting, business management, and online resident engagement solutions to community associations and property management companies in the homeowners association (HOA) industry.

TOPS’s software applications are used by thousands of organizations to manage millions of homes across the United States.

[Visit Site](http://www.topssoft.com/)

![Medix Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Untitled%20design%20(2)%20(2).png?width=275&height=57&name=Untitled%20design%20(2)%20(2).png)

#### Medix

About the Company

Medix is one of the largest staffing firms in the U.S., focused on the attractive “Allied Health” vertical within the broader healthcare market. Medix’s healthcare services include a host of non-physician and non-travel nurse “keep the lights on” staff (e.g., registered nurses, medical assistants, technicians, billing/ coding, customer care) that are core to the day-to-day operations of hospitals, medical practices, ambulatory / outpatient providers, labs, insurance companies, and other healthcare providers. Medix also has sizable practices in the areas of information technology (with a focus on healthcare information technology systems and electronic medical records) and life sciences (scientific and clinical research for pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and consumer products / food and beverages).

[Visit Site](https://www.medixteam.com/)

![Greenform Logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Greenform%20(1).png?width=275&height=42&name=Greenform%20(1).png)

#### GreenSlate

About the Company

GreenSlate is a leading provider of payroll and production accounting solutions for the entertainment industry. With its comprehensive all-in-one platform, production accountants can more efficiently track production expenses and pay their crews. GreenSlate manages some of the largest episodic budgets in production and supports some of the biggest names in the entertainment industry, including Netflix, Paramount, Imagine Entertainment, Tyler Perry Studios, and many others.

[Visit Site](https://gslate.com/)

## Our Success Stories

### TOPS Software

TOPS is the industry leader in accounting and community management SaaS solutions to the property management and HOA industries, in use at over 45,000 communities nationwide representing more than 5 million homes.

[Read Case Study](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hubfs/2021-11-CS-ADC-TOPS-2.pdf?hsLang=en)

![tops logo](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ADC%20CMS%20Theme/logos/tops-logo-1.png?width=224&name=tops-logo-1.png)

### SmartBug Media

SmartBug is a globally recognized digital marketing agency assisting businesses in growing revenue by generating leads, increasing brand awareness, and building customer loyalty through content marketing, sales enablement, web development, marketing automation, and public relations.

[Read Case Study](https://fs.hubspotusercontent00.net/hubfs/9480858/2021-11-CS-ADC-SmartBug-1.pdf)

content.text: Let me check the specific news articles about their investments to ensure I have the complete list of current portfolio companies:

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "## Get the latest news sent directly to your inbox.

Enter your email to subscribe to our news

[Back To All News & Press](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news)

News & Press Releases

# American Pain Consortium Holdings Announces Strategic Growth Investment from American Discovery Capital

February 27, 2018

_Investment will fuel continued growth and build upon APCH’s leadership position as a service provider to pain management and ambulatory surgical centers._

INDIANAPOLIS (PRWEB)FEBRUARY 27, 2018

American Discovery Capital, LLC (“ADC”) is pleased to announce a growth equity investment in American Pain Consortium Holdings, LLC, (“APCH” or the “Company”) a new entity formed to provide management services to interventional pain management (“IPM”) practices and Ambulatory Surgical Centers (“ASC”) across the Midwest. The Company’s predecessor was founded in 1992 by Dr. Edward J. Kowlowitz, a board certified pain management physician, leading expert in chronic and acute pain management, and international leader in pain related neuromodulation. Dr. Kowlowitz will become chief executive officer and president of APCH, as well as serve as a member of its Board of Directors.

Headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, APCH is positioned to be one of the leading comprehensive pain management companies in the Midwest. The Company provides administrative and support services to pain clinics which offer a comprehensive, fully integrated suite of services to address a variety of pain conditions. Treatments include nerve blocks and injections, spinal cord stimulators, intrathecal pain pumps, ketamine infusions, diagnostic imaging services, high complexity toxicology lab services, physical therapy, responsible pain medication management and psychological services. Currently, the practice has five physicians, all board certified by the American Board of Anesthesiology with added qualifications in pain management, six physician extenders, three physical therapists and two mental health providers specializing in pain management. The facilities include three clinics and two ASCs. As part of this partnership and expansion, the practice is undergoing a million dollar expansion and renovation of their platform location in Indianapolis. The flagship practice in Indianapolis will serve as a template for APCH’s patient care model, management structure, best practices and brand strategy as the Company acquires and expands the services of pain management practices throughout the Midwest.

Edward Kowlowitz, chief executive officer and president of APCH, commented, “We are committed to continue to deliver world class patient care to individuals suffering from chronic pain. We are thrilled to partner with American Discovery Capital to bring our industry expertise and business model to serve patients in a number of new markets. Given the current milieu surrounding the “opioid crisis” in our country, it is imperative that competent well trained physicians have the resources and support staff necessary to provide evidence based treatment protocols and safe, balanced compassionate care to the millions of patients suffering from chronic pain.”

Frank McMahon, a founding partner at ADC, said “Dr. Kowlowitz and his team of highly-skilled physicians, providers and management team have built an incredible pain management practice and have clearly become the market leaders in the population they serve. We look forward to supporting the Company’s growth in the coming years by providing capital, operational expertise and guidance as the Company enters new markets and continues serving the growing population of individuals suffering from chronic pain. APCH plans to bring smaller practices under the APCH quality umbrella and expand their existing service lines to bring this tested vision of effectual, responsible, cost effective pain management to patients throughout the Midwest.

In addition to the growth equity capital provided by ADC, the Company has secured $21 million of committed financing from J.P. Morgan. Financial terms of ADC’s investment were not disclosed.

Faegre Baker Daniels, LLP served as legal counsel to Edward Kowlowitz and the predecessor companies to APCH and Bodman PLC served as legal counsel to ADC.

ABOUT AMERICAN PAIN CONSORTIUM HOLDINGS, LLC

American Pain Consortium Holdings, LLC was formed by the contribution of certain assets and operations formerly part of Shadeland Anesthesia & Pain Associates, Inc., P.C., doing business as “Center for Pain Management”, Center for Special Surgery, LLC and Center for Southside Surgery (collectively referred to as “IndyPain”).

Founded in 1992 and based in Indianapolis, IN, IndyPain is one of the leading interventional pain management practices in the state of Indiana. IndyPain offers a full suite of tailored services and treatments to treat a number of chronic pain conditions in a comprehensive and integrated fashion. Learn more about IndyPain at [http://www.indypain.com](http://www.indypain.com/).

ABOUT AMERICAN DISCOVERY CAPITAL

Based in Los Angeles, CA, American Discovery Capital (ADC) is a private equity firm investing in leading family-owned and middle market companies operating in high-growth industry sectors, including: Enterprise Software, Business & Technology Services, Healthcare Services and FinTech. ADC targets long-term relationships with entrepreneurs and senior management of companies in search of capital and industry expertise to support organic growth, fund acquisitions or provide partial liquidity to founders or families in the midst of generational ownership transfers. Please visit our website at [http://www.americandiscoverycapital.com](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/).

## Recent articles

July 8, 2025

### [GTCR Announces Strategic Investment in Clear Capital](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/gtcr-announces-strategic-investment-in-clear-capital)

[Read More](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/gtcr-announces-strategic-investment-in-clear-capital)

March 19, 2025

### [VICE Media Acquires London Alley Entertainment](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/vice-media-acquires-london-alley-entertainment)

[Read More](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/vice-media-acquires-london-alley-entertainment)

February 27, 2025

### [TowerBrook Capital Partners Announces Strategic Investment in BRG](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/towerbrook-capital-partners-announces-strategic-investment-in-brg)

[Read More](https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/news/towerbrook-capital-partners-announces-strategic-investment-in-brg)

Twitter Widget Iframe"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}
